header.headertext: AMENDMENTS TO BE MOVED ON REPORT

amendments.proposer: THE LORD BISHOP OF RIPON AND LEEDS

text.quote: 000: Clause 17, the Lord Bishop of Ripon and Leeds gives notice of his intention to oppose the Question that Clause 17 stand part of the Bill.

text.quote: 000: Clause 22, page 13, line 8, leave out paragraph (a)
